description: [Nebulae](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0630) uses functions named StartUserModeBrowserInjection and StopUserModeBrowserInjection indicating that it's trying to imitate chrome_frame_helper.dll.(Citation: Bitdefender Naikon April 2021)
